branchCategory.name: CG5-S

branchItem.name: C(D)G5-S, Stainless Steel Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's CG5-S series is a stainless steel cylinder, perfect for use in wash down applications such as food processing machinery requiring intense cleaning.  The use of non-toxic additives allows confident use in equipment for foods, beverages and medical products, etc.  The CG5-S can be disassembled, allowing replacement of seals, which promotes an extended service life.  SMC provides plugs for unused mounting threads to prevent residue build-up in the threads.  The use of stainless steel (SUS304) on external metal parts provides improved corrosion resistance in environments with exposure to water. </p>

branchItem.name: C(D)G5-S-X6011, Stainless Steel Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, NFPA
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's CG5-X6011 series is a NFPA mounting interchangeable, stainless steel cylinder, perfect for use in wash down applications such as food processing machinery requiring intense cleaning.  The use of non-toxic additives allows confident use in equipment for foods, beverages and medical products, etc.  The CG5-S can be disassembled, allowing replacement of seals, which promotes an extended service life.  SMC provides plugs for unused mounting threads to prevent residue build-up in the threads.  The use of stainless steel (SUS304) on external metal parts provides improved corrosion resistance in environments with exposure to water. </p>

branchItem.name: C(D)G5-S-X165US, Stainless Steel Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's CG5-S-X165US series is a stainless steel cylinder, perfect for use in wash down applications such as food processing machinery requiring intense cleaning. &nbsp;CG5-S-X165US includes all the features of the standard CG5 but includes inch size piston rod threads and NPT ports.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)G5, Accessory, Mounting Bracket
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's CG5 series stainless steel add on mounting brackets.</p>
